de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.initialization

Interface KMedoidsInitialization<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FarthestPointsInitialMeans, FarthestSumPointsInitialMeans, FirstKInitialMeans, KMeansPlusPlusInitialMeans, PAMInitialMeans, RandomlyChosenInitialMeans

    public interface KMedoidsInitialization<V>
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids. In contrast to k-means initializers, this initialization will only return members of the original data set.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DBIDs chooseInitialMedoids(int k, DBIDs ids, DistanceQuery<? super V> distanceFunction)
      Choose initial means

    • Method Detail

      • chooseInitialMedoids

        DBIDs chooseInitialMedoids(int k,
                         DBIDs ids,
                         DistanceQuery<? super V> distanceFunction)
        Choose initial means
        Parameters:
        k - Parameter k
        ids - Candidate IDs.
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        Returns:
        List of chosen means for k-means
